attributes.additional_details: We should be putting ourselves in a better position to support in conflicts around the work such as that in Ukraine, but also to put ourselves on a better footing to defend ourselves and our allies should any conflict escalate to a level that requires NATO involvement. The government is currently lagging behind our allies in defence budgets and are not fully prepared for escalation of any sort.
attributes.background: We should be increasing our defence spending to increase our stockpiles of ammunition and provide us with additional resources such as Tanks, Frigates, Aircraft and Drones.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Increase defence spending by 0.15% of GDP per year, until it reaches 3.5% of GDP
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703607

Increase defence spending to a minimum of 3% of GDP with immediate effect.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705399
